verses.sanskrit: कोन्वस्मिन्साम्प्रतं लोके गुणवान्कश्च वीर्यवान् ।धर्मज्ञश्च कृतज्ञश्च सत्यवाक्यो दृढव्रत:।।
verses.english: Who in this world lives today endowed with excellent qualities, prowess, righteousness, gratitude, truthfulness and firmness in his vows?

verses.sanskrit: चारित्रेण च को युक्तस्सर्वभूतेषु को हित: ।विद्वान्क: कस्समर्थश्च कश्चैकप्रियदर्शन: ।।
verses.english: Who is that one gifted with good conduct, given to the wellbeing of all living creatures, learned in the lore knowledge of all things that is known, capable of doing things which others can not do and singularly handsome?

verses.sanskrit: आत्मवान्को जितक्रोधो द्युतिमान्कोऽनसूयक: । कस्य बिभ्यति देवाश्च जातरोषस्य संयुगे ।।
verses.english: Who among men is selfrestrained? Who has conquered anger? Who is endowed with brilliance and free from envy? Who is that when excited to wrath even the devatas, are afraid of let alone foes?

verses.sanskrit: एतदिच्छाम्यहं श्रोतुं परं कौतूहलं हि मे ।महर्षे त्वं समर्थोऽसि ज्ञातुमेवंविधं नरम् ।।
verses.english: O Maharshi, I intend to hear about such a man whom you are able to place? Indeed great is my curiosity
